data.title: Video: Catching Up With Raymond Felton
data.meta_description:
Former NBA point guard and 2005 NCAA Champion Raymond Felton
talks about life after the NBA,...
data.text:
Former NBA point guard and 2005 NCAA Champion Raymond Felton talks about life after the NBA, playing for the North Carolina Tar Heels, having to defend Kobe Bryant and Ray Allen early in his career, his plans for the future, and much more.
